seo.title: The future for AI-driven e-commerce
seo.description: YOUR AI Protocol is the world's first AI-driven content layer for e-commerce built on Bitcoin and Solana.

intro.headline: The future for
intro.title: AI-driven e-commerce
intro.text: YOUR Protocol is the world's first AI-driven content layer for e-commerce built on <bitcoin></bitcoin> and <solana></solana>.

vision.headline: Vision
vision.title: Disrupt e-commerce with our AI-driven content layer
text: Introducing YOUR, a revolutionary Web3 protocol for the booming $8.8 trillion e-commerce market by 2026. Brands such as Apple and Samsung struggle with content control and accuracy online. YOUR empowers them with full control, ownership, transparency.
By giving e-commerce shops access to stream AI-driven personalised product content, we not only enhance the shopping experience but also significantly increases conversion rates.

product.headline: Product
product.title: Streaming and creation dApps
text: Celebrate our 1-year milestone with three revolutionary protocol apps, a robust Software Development Kit (SDK), and a Shopify app designed to empower every shop globally in streaming AI-driven product content effortlessly. Furthermore, our content editor app is fully operational, actively utilized by over 25000 creators to curate and create user-generated content.
As proud members of the Google Startup Program, we've secured a grant for Google Cloud. Join us for a year of innovation and success!

shopify.title: Shopify application
shopify.text: Partnership with Shopify to seamlessly stream AI-driven product content for webshops, effortlessly personalising the user experience.

sdk.title: Code integration
sdk.text: Implement our SDK for AI-driven product content, ensuring compatibility across leading global platforms such as Salesforce.

create.title: Creation application
create.text: Our content editor app has 25000+ active creators creating a foundation for YOUR AI Picasso.

protocol.title: World's first AI content layer for e-commerce
protocol.headline: YOUR protocol
text: Smart reward mechanism for protocol contributors

preSeed.title: Preseed
preSeed.text: 5% unlocking at listing, 5% each month thereafter

seed.title: Seed
seed.text: 5% unlocking at listing, 7.5% each month thereafter

private.title: Private
private.text: 5% unlocking at listing, 7.5% each month thereafter

kol.title: Kol
kol.text: 15% unlocking at listing, 7.5% each month thereafter

publicSale.title: Public sale
publicSale.text: 30% unlocking at listing, 15% each month thereafter

team.title: Team
team.text: 100% locked for 6 months, 10% unlocked each month thereafter

advisors.title: Advisors
advisors.text: 100% locked for 6 months, 10% unlocked each month thereafter

network.title: Network
network.text: Starts with 100% locked and unlocking for each reward given to the community

utility.headline: Token utility
utility.title: Sharing the company's success with holders
utility.text: $YOUR utilises a smart reward, buy back and staking mechanism to support the value of the $YOUR token and share the company's success with holders.

earn.title: Earn $YOUR tokens
earn.text: Content Creators, Curators, Nodes, and Developers that contribute to grow and maintain the protocol, get rewarded in $YOUR tokens.

pools.title: Continuous buyback cycle
pools.text: Content Distribution dApps buy $YOUR Tokens to stream content plus Content Creation dApps buy $YOUR Tokens to store & control content.

staking.title: Holding benefits
staking.text: Protocol users must stake $YOUR tokens for content features access and will also earn APY for long-term staking.

security.headline: Security
security.title: Battle-tested smart contract
text: We're excited to share that Zokyo, a leading Web3 cybersecurity firm, has successfully audited our smart contract.
With their expertise, we can confidently state that our smart contract meets the highest security standards, reinforcing our commitment to the safety and trust of our community.

join.title: Join us on this journey
join.text: Get on the waitlist for early-access to the first pre-sale
